test.name: 1001 Home Page Should Load

kw.name: Open Browser To CRM Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.
Ouvre le navigateur et accède à la page CRM

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Close CRM Browser
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Ferme le navigateur CRM

test.doc: Vérifie que la page d'accueil se charge correctement et contient les éléments attendus.

test.name: 1002 Login Successfully With Valid Credentials

kw.name: Open Browser To CRM Page
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.
Ouvre le navigateur et accède à la page CRM

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Login With Credentials
Input Email Address
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Saisit l'adresse email dans le champ correspondant

kw.name: Input Password
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
Saisit le mot de passe dans le champ correspondant

kw.name: Click Submit Button
Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
Clique sur le bouton de soumission

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.
Effectue une connexion complète avec email et mot de passe

kw.name: Wait Until Location Contains
kw.doc: Waits until the current URL contains ``expected``.

kw.name: Title Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that the current page title equals ``title``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Our Happy Customers'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Close CRM Browser
Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Ferme le navigateur CRM

test.doc: Teste la connexion réussie avec des identifiants valides.
